messages.author: Oujimaru
messages.text: Hello there our dearest angel!~ I have not been a tenshimp for a long time, I followed you back in late December. But I just gotta sayâ€¦ Thank you! Thank you for putting a wholesome smile on my face. Your laugh made my heart melt and I love how you communicate with your fans. In pretty difficult times, I have been looking at your live sessions and clips and immediately feel like a blessed individual. Thank you so much for being who you are, and I hope that we will see more great content from you! â¤ï¸

messages.author: Bapu
messages.text:
ã‚ãªãŸãŒã„ãªãã¦å¯‚ã—ã„ã§ã™, æ—©ãå…ƒæ°—å‡ºã—ã¦ã­ã€‚ä¼šã„ãŸã„ã§ã™
Okaeri, Uto-chan. When you come back you best believe it's time to redeem all the fun we missed out during your short break. I never imagined you'd be my biggest reason to start picking up Japanese again, seeing your duolingo streams and realizing how hard it is for the Japanese such as you to learn English.
There'll be rainy days and bumpy roads for as long you delve in this journey, but I humbly ask that you remember that you have brought joy and happiness to hundreds of thousands of souls that are watching you. And for that, we will all be with you to go through the rough patches as your viewers, friends or mayhaps, family. Come back whenever you think you're ready! All of us are missing you dearly, Uto-chan!ğŸ’™ğŸ’™

messages.author: Ono Anastasia
messages.text:
Tenshi-san!
 Please come back.
 I promised you to be a VTuber just like you.
 I will be like that soon.
 You are the only oil that can reignite my flame to do YouTube once again!

messages.author: Lmao Ice
messages.text:
Ice to meet you, Ice miss you.
Ice is lonely without you.
Ice is melted thanks to you.
Ice just want to cheer for you.
Ice's akasupa is there for you.
Ice just want to be with you.
Ice is not Ice when you not you.
Ice will always be there for you.
Last but not least Ice care for you.
Uto Uto Ice(æ„›)ã—ã¦ã‚‹.

messages.author: TheUnsavoury
messages.text: Welcome back Tenshi, we love you. Tenshi do not think much about these trolls, and I shall quote English pop start Talyor Swift, 'Haters gonna hate' . I and the fans love you, and we will always be with you, through thick and thin!!! Chin up, and smile like you always do, and Okaerinasai Tenshi sama.

messages.author: Primster
messages.text:
Welcome back, Angel. When watching your streams, it's been the first time I've felt my soul getting purified.
I hope you had a nice break, we love you!

messages.author: Shinji
messages.text: We will wait for our angel arrival and we will fight for our angel no matter what it takes we will see her beautiful smile and such a cute voice that we will never forget

messages.author: Jacob T.
messages.text:
You are as beautiful as the day we lost you.
Your strength is a beacon of light, shining ever on
In our hearts, minds, and eyes.
 Your smile and your laughs, your thank yous and goodbyes,
 All enough to bring tears to our shadow-cast eyes.
 Your heart and your joy, the warmth that you shared
 Were times that we knew were filled with your care.
 The tears shed and moments lost
 Are all worth it if we could see you again, whatever the cost.
 You warmed the hearts of an entire world;
 A true angel, and a wonderful girl.

messages.author: Wet Floor
messages.text:
Good morning, sunshine!
Mornings missed you.
I miss you.

messages.author: Cadius
messages.text:
Welcome back Tenshi Uto,
you have cured so many people who had a bad time.hope Uto will purify us liked you always do when you return.till then, have a break, you deserved it

messages.author: Sans With a Guitar
messages.text:
I think that i am talking for most of us when i say that we hope that you are alright, you meant so much to us, you gave us so many good times when we needed it the most that it would really feel unfair to see you having a bad one.
We hope to see you again soon...
